titles: An ansvver to a popish pamphlet called the touch-stone of the reformed gospell. made speciallie out of themselves. By William Guild, D.D. and preacher of Gods word.
author: Guild, William, 1586-1657.
notes: Text and register continuous despite pagination.
With a table of cited authors (and corresponding page numbers), and an errata leaf at end of text.
In answer to: Heigham, John.  The Touch-stone of the reformed gospel; work formerly attributed to Matthew Kellison.
Reproduction of the original in the Aberdeen Univeristy Library, Aberdeen.
keywords: Heigham, John, fl. 1639. --  Touch-stone of the reformed gospel --  Early works to 1800.
